attributes.action: Implement a 10 year mandatory minimum sentence for child sexual predators
attributes.additional_details:
All the details are available in this Change.org petition through the link below. As the character limit of less than a thousand characters is no way near enough for such a deep topic.

https://www.change.org/p/referendum-for-increasing-sentencing-for-pedophiles-minimum-10-15-years-custody?recruiter=1160936274&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=facebook&utm_campaign=petition_dashboard&recruited_by_id=79a65620-1e3b-11eb-b89a-b5aaef8bb200
attributes.background: Implementation of a 10 year mandatory minimum sentence for pedophiles & trial by jury for those who; commit sexual abuse, are found with pornographic images of children or attempt to sexually abuse children.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556664
